downloads.title: Downloads
downloads.description: Download Freesm Launcher for your specific platform.

about.title: About
about.description: We created Freesm Launcher to make it possible to play Minecraft with the conveniences that Prism Launcher provides, without requiring an online account.

hero.title: Download Freesm Launcher for
hero.description: Freesm Launcher is a custom launcher for Minecraft that allows you to play with offline account without any restrictions.

features.first-description: Freesm Launcher is an open source fork of Prism Launcher. All launcher code is available under the GPL-3.0 license.
features.second-description: Easily play Minecraft without any restrictions, even if you don't have an online account.
